T02TD2143E:216a-1: aa ba ri mi ta a'a yu rdzny'a na s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD2143E:216a-3: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2143E:216a-4: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2143E:216a-5: rigs drug sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD2143E:216a-6: tshe nyams pa la gso ba'i phyir //
T02TD2143E:216a-7: bcom ldan ye shes tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:216a-8: sgrub thabs yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2143E:216a-9: dang brtson dbang thob dam tshig ldan ;
T02TD2143E:216a-10: / tshe nyams pa rnams gso 'dod pas //
T02TD2143E:216a-11: dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas 'dug nas //
T02TD2143E:216a-12: bsod nams tshogs kyi sngon 'gro ni //
T02TD2143E:216a-13: bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams //
T02TD2143E:216a-14: nam mkhar spyan drangs phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2143E:216a-15: mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa dang //
T02TD2143E:216b-0: changs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par @216b bya ;
T02TD2143E:216b-1: / rang gi snying gar hr'i: dmar las //
T02TD2143E:216b-2: ye shes me 'bar rnam smin bsregs //
T02TD2143E:216b-3: sngags kyi don la stong nyid bsgom //
T02TD2143E:216b-4: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho nyham /
T02TD2143E:216b-5: stong pa'i ngang las sems nyid ni //
T02TD2143E:216b-6: hr'i: dmar tsheg drag thig le las //
T02TD2143E:216b-7: dbang chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2143E:216b-8: spyan gsum khro gnyer ljags 'dril ba //
T02TD2143E:216b-9: steng zhal rta mgo ljang gul //
T02TD2143E:216b-10: drag pos rta skad rab tu mtsher //
T02TD2143E:216b-11: dbyug pa'i sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar //
T02TD2143E:216b-12: thugs kar padma rgyas pa yis //
T02TD2143E:216b-13: steng du zla ba nyi ma la //
T02TD2143E:216b-15: ae las chos 'byung yangs pa ru //
T02TD2143E:216b-16: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02TD2143E:216b-17: bam las chu dang lam las sa //
T02TD2143E:216b-18: sum las ri rab lhun po dang //
T02TD2143E:216b-19: de steng bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2143E:216b-20: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan //
T02TD2143E:216b-21: 'dod yon pha gu dra phyed mdzes //
T02TD2143E:216b-22: khor yug chu skyes sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2143E:216b-23: rdo rje me ri thogs pa med //
T02TD2143E:216b-24: pho brang chu skyes 'phang rim gnyis //
T02TD2143E:216b-25: 'dab ma bzhi dang brgyad pa la //
T02TD2143E:216b-26: mu khyud pad mas mdzes pa dang //
T02TD2143E:216b-27: lha snam pan reg lnga dang ldan //
T02TD2143E:216b-29: aa las chu shel dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2143E:216b-30: ram las rta bdun dag tu gyur //
T02TD2143E:216b-31: steng du padma hr'i: yis mtshan //
T02TD2143E:216b-33: tshur 'dus hr'i: la thim pa yi //
T02TD2143E:216b-34: li khri lta bu'i thig le las //
T02TD2143E:216b-35: bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni //
T02TD2143E:216b-37: phyag gnyis padma r'a ga yi //
T02TD2143E:216b-38: bum pa 'chi med bdud rtsis gang //
T02TD2143E:216b-39: 'gro rnams re skong dpag bsam shing //
T02TD2143E:216b-40: bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs kar 'dzin //
T02TD2143E:216b-41: yum la 'khyud cing gnyis su med //
T02TD2143E:216b-42: pam las yum mchog gos dkar mo //
T02TD2143E:216b-43: li khri lta bur 'dzum zhing sgeg / g-yas pa padma g-yon pa ni //
T02TD2143E:216b-44: bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa la //
T02TD2143E:216b-45: yab la gnyis med legs par 'khril //
T02TD2143E:216b-46: dar dang nor bu du mas brgyan //
T02TD2143E:216b-47: chu skyes brgyad dang lha snam la //
T02TD2143E:216b-48: padma zla ba nyi ma'i gdan //
T02TD2143E:216b-49: mtshams bzhi'i sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan //
T02TD2143E:216b-50: shar du rdo rje h'um gis mtshan //
T02TD2143E:216b-51: de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:216b-52: lho ru rin chen t'am gis mtshan //
T02TD2143E:216b-53: rin chen rigs kyi tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:216b-54: nub tu 'khor lo aom gyis mtshan //
T02TD2143E:216b-55: rnam par snang mdzad tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:216b-56: byang du ral gri aa yis mtshan //
T02TD2143E:217a-2: shar lhor mam las m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2143E:217a-3: lho nub t'am las lha mo sgrol //
T02TD2143E:217a-4: nub byang lam las sangs rgyas spyan //
T02TD2143E:217a-5: byang shar t'am las dam tshig sgrol //
T02TD2143E:217a-6: rigs bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya las //
T02TD2143E:217a-7: shel dang bee d'urya gser dang ni //
T02TD2143E:217a-9: yum la g-yas pa rang rtags dang //
T02TD2143E:217a-11: shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi //
T02TD2143E:217a-12: lho ru rin chen sems dpa' bzhi //
T02TD2143E:217a-13: nub tu rnam snang sems dpa' bzhi //
T02TD2143E:217a-14: byang du las kyi sems dpa' bzhi //
T02TD2143E:217a-15: g-yas pa rang rtags 'dzin pa la //
T02TD2143E:217a-16: g-yon pas tshe yi bum pa 'dzin //
T02TD2143E:217a-17: thams cad dar dang nor bus brgyan //
T02TD2143E:217a-18: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2143E:217a-19: mtshams bzhi la ni mchod pa yi //
T02TD2143E:217a-20: bdug spos mar me me tog ma //
T02TD2143E:217a-21: dri chab ma dang lha mo bzhi //
T02TD2143E:217a-23: shar sgor dza: las lcags kyu dkar //
T02TD2143E:217a-24: lho sgor h'um las zhags pa ser //
T02TD2143E:217a-25: nub sgor bam las lcags sgrog dmar //
T02TD2143E:217a-26: byad sgor ho: las dril bu ljang //
T02TD2143E:217a-27: sgo ba bzhi po de dag ni //
T02TD2143E:217a-29: de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2143E:217a-30: rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa //
T02TD2143E:217a-31: tshig 'dis spyan ni drang bar bya //
T02TD2143E:217a-32: gdod nas rang bzhin nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD2143E:217a-33: thugs rje 'ja' tshon skur ston pa'i //
T02TD2143E:217a-34: bcom ldan gsung mchog tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:217a-35: rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas //
T02TD2143E:217a-38: tshe zad tshe nyams gso ba'i phyir //
T02TD2143E:217a-39: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2143E:217a-40: rdo rje rin chen rnam snang dang //
T02TD2143E:217a-41: las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med //
T02TD2143E:217a-42: yum bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo dang //
T02TD2143E:217a-43: sems dpa' bcu drug sgo mar bcas //
T02TD2143E:217a-44: rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor nas //
T02TD2143E:217a-46: tshe dang ye shes rgyas pa dang //
T02TD2143E:217a-47: thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir ;
T02TD2143E:217a-49: byin gyis rlob cid gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2143E:217a-50: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug bya //
T02TD2143E:217a-51: sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2143E:217a-52: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2143E:217a-53: rigs bdag rnams kyis dbu brgyan te //
T02TD2143E:217a-54: mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang//
T02TD2143E:217b-0: @217b bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya //
T02TD2143E:217b-1: de nas bying rgod rab spangs nas //
T02TD2143E:217b-2: ma yengs lha rnams gsal stong bsgom //
T02TD2143E:217b-3: de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02TD2143E:217b-4: lha rnams thugs ka'i bum pa ru //
T02TD2143E:217b-5: hr'i: h'um tr'am bhr'um aa las ni //
T02TD2143E:217b-6: rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom //
T02TD2143E:217b-7: aom hr'i: bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a//
T02TD2143E:217b-8: aom h'um bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:217b-9: aom sv'a bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:217b-10: aom aom bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:217b-11: aom a'a: bhr'um badzra dzny'a na a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:217b-12: de rnams yab kyi snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD2143E:217b-13: yum gyi bum par pam mam tram lam tam rnams las sngags kyis bskor /
T02TD2143E:217b-14: aom bhr'um aa pa ri mi ti a'a yurdzny'a na su bi ni shtsi ta te dzo r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD2143E:217b-15: yum mchog lnga yi snying po'o //
T02TD2143E:217b-16: phyogs bzhi sems dpa' bcu drug la //
T02TD2143E:217b-17: rang gis bon rnams la ni //
T02TD2143E:217b-18: gco bo'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams //
T02TD2143E:217b-19: dza: h'um bam ho: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na su bi ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:217b-20: sgom bzhi'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD2143E:217b-21: de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la //
T02TD2143E:217b-22: dmigs te gsang sngags bzlas pa yis //
T02TD2143E:217b-23: yig 'bru rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02TD2143E:217b-24: babs pas bum pa gang par bsam //
T02TD2143E:217b-25: bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD2143E:217b-26: rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis //
T02TD2143E:217b-27: lus ngag yid gsum nang gdon dang //
T02TD2143E:217b-28: sdig sgri bdag nas dbang bzhi thob //
T02TD2143E:217b-29: 'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam //
T02TD2143E:217b-30: de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas //
T02TD2143E:217b-31: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyi //
T02TD2143E:217b-32: rang rang gsang sngags bzlas par bsgom //
T02TD2143E:217b-33: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer las //
T02TD2143E:217b-34: lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs //
T02TD2143E:217b-35: bsam gyis mi khyab shar du 'phros //
T02TD2143E:217b-36: nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas te //
T02TD2143E:217b-37: dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas //
T02TD2143E:217b-38: bdag bskyod lha dang bum par bstim //
T02TD2143E:217b-39: de bzhin lho yi zhags pa mos //
T02TD2143E:217b-40: tshe dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas //
T02TD2143E:217b-41: gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste //
T02TD2143E:217b-42: gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya //
T02TD2143E:217b-43: nub kyi lcags sgrog dmar mo yis //
T02TD2143E:217b-44: srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te //
T02TD2143E:217b-45: chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug nas //
T02TD2143E:217b-46: bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam //
T02TD2143E:217b-47: byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzes mas //
T02TD2143E:217b-48: nad gdon log 'dren tshar bcad nas //
T02TD2143E:218a-1: sbyin lag nas tshe bkug nas //
T02TD2143E:218a-2: gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim //
T02TD2143E:218a-3: bum pa dag la brten nas ni //
T02TD2143E:218a-4: 'chi med tsho sgrub bshad pa ni //
T02TD2143E:218a-5: rnam rgyal las bum gnyis po la //
T02TD2143E:218a-6: rdzas dang kha rgyan mgul 'chings bcas //
T02TD2143E:218a-7: phyag mtshan bris la gdags par bya //
T02TD2143E:218a-8: mandal steng du legs par gzhag / phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la //
T02TD2143E:218a-9: nang du gzhal yas khang du bsgom //
T02TD2143E:218a-10: gsang sngags rgyal po'i bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2143E:218a-11: gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa gang //
T02TD2143E:218a-12: de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyi //
T02TD2143E:218a-13: nad gdon sdig sgrib ma lus dag /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam //
T02TD2143E:218a-14: las bum rta mgrin gong bzhin bskyed //
T02TD2143E:218a-15: thugs ka'i sa bon sngags kyis bskor //
T02TD2143E:218a-16: aom badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i ba hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2143E:218a-17: de yis rang gzhan bar chad bsrung //
T02TD2143E:218a-19: de ltar rang don gzhan don la //
T02TD2143E:218a-20: ma yengs bskyed rim gsal ba yis //
T02TD2143E:218a-21: ting 'dzin gcig tu sngags bzlas na //
T02TD2143E:218a-22: rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthong 'gyur //
T02TD2143E:218a-23: de nas rgyun du nyams su len //
T02TD2143E:218a-24: khva ta'i skad kyis mnon par //
T02TD2143E:218a-25: bdag nyid gzhan dang ngag ma 'dres //
T02TD2143E:218a-26: mdun du chu skyes stong dang ldan //
T02TD2143E:218a-27: gtso bo yab yum gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD2143E:218a-28: aom a'a yu she sa ra ha ka ra ri sha ra ri h'um //
T02TD2143E:218a-29: gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya //
T02TD2143E:218a-30: bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2143E:218a-31: sgrub byed sngags kyi rgyal po 'di //
T02TD2143E:218a-32: aom aa ma ra ni dz'i want'i ye sv'a h'a //
T02TD2143E:218a-33: gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas //
T02TD2143E:218a-34: de yi si bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas //
T02TD2143E:218a-35: rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis //
T02TD2143E:218a-36: nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad dag / bdud rtsis rang lus gang ba yin //
T02TD2143E:218a-37: 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub thob //
T02TD2143E:218a-38: tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam //
T02TD2143E:218a-39: brtan pa'i yan lag lnga bzlas so //
T02TD2143E:218a-40: mdu na bskyed bdag la bstim pa dang //
T02TD2143E:218a-41: de yi tshe tshad nyi zlar 'gyur //
T02TD2143E:218a-42: tshe nyams la sogs smos ci dgos //
T02TD2143E:218a-43: gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags //
T02TD2143E:218a-44: de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya //
T02TD2143E:218b-0: lha tshogs thams @218b cad li khri ltar //
T02TD2143E:218b-1: sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02TD2143E:218b-2: bum pa thod par bcas pa 'dzin //
T02TD2143E:218b-3: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2143E:218b-4: bcu drug lon pa sku sha rgyas //
T02TD2143E:218b-6: padma rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-7: 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02TD2143E:218b-9: g-yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis gang //
T02TD2143E:218b-10: yab la stobs shing gnyis su 'khril //
T02TD2143E:218b-11: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med //
T02TD2143E:218b-13: snyoms 'jug zag med bde ba rgyas //
T02TD2143E:218b-14: mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi'i bum pa bzhi //
T02TD2143E:218b-15: phyogs kyi lha yi snam bu la //
T02TD2143E:218b-16: shar du rdo rje khro bo dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-17: lho ru rin chen khro bo dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-18: nub tu padma'i khro bo dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-19: byar du phrin las khro bo dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-20: steng 'og rnam snang khro bo gnyis //
T02TD2143E:218b-21: phyogs bzhir khro bo gnyis gnyis ni //
T02TD2143E:218b-22: rigs kyi yum dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2143E:218b-23: g-yas bskyam g-yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o //
T02TD2143E:218b-24: thams cad g-yas pa rang rtags 'dzin //
T02TD2143E:218b-25: g-yon pa tshe yi bum pa dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-26: sprul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan //
T02TD2143E:218b-27: me re 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs //
T02TD2143E:218b-28: lha mo bzhi dang sgo ba bzhi //
T02TD2143E:218b-29: bzhengs pa khro bo'i tshul du gnas //
T02TD2143E:218b-30: 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2143E:218b-31: ye shes spyan drang gnyis med bstim //
T02TD2143E:218b-32: dbang bskur rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa //
T02TD2143E:218b-33: gtso bo lnga dang khro bo bcu'i //
T02TD2143E:218b-34: bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2143E:218b-35: gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya //
T02TD2143E:218b-37: sv'a bhr'um a'a: dza: h'um bam ho: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yurdzny'a na ma h'a siddhi ha sa ni ri ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2143E:218b-38: de nas rang nyid bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2143E:218b-39: bum pa legs par bcas pa la //
T02TD2143E:218b-40: lha rnams gong bzhin bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2143E:218b-41: rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas pas //
T02TD2143E:218b-42: 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa gang //
T02TD2143E:218b-43: rjes su lha rnams zhu ba'i chus //
T02TD2143E:218b-44: rang gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o //
T02TD2143E:218b-45: de yis mchog dang thun mong gi / dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2143E:218b-46: bdud rtsi lnga yi gtor ma 'di //
T02TD2143E:218b-47: snying po sngags kyis 'bul bar bya //
T02TD2143E:218b-48: las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang //
T02TD2143E:219a-2: de nas de kho na nyid sgrub //
T02TD2143E:219a-3: rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi //
T02TD2143E:219a-4: gsang gnas chos 'byung gru gsum du //
T02TD2143E:219a-5: hr'i: dang pam las me 'bar bas //
T02TD2143E:219a-6: lus kyi nang rnams thams cad khengs //
T02TD2143E:219a-7: spyi bo'i ham brgyad zhu ba las //
T02TD2143E:219a-8: bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab //
T02TD2143E:219a-9: rtsa gsum gang bas bde ba rgyas //
T02TD2143E:219a-10: dro dang bde pa'i khyad par rnams //
T02TD2143E:219a-11: steng 'og rlung gis mnan zhes bya //
T02TD2143E:219a-12: rta bdun ri bo rgyas 'dra nas //
T02TD2143E:219a-13: mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob //
T02TD2143E:219a-14: bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2143E:219a-15: tshe dpag med pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD2143E:219a-17: bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba la //
T02TD2143E:219a-18: brten nas grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad //
T02TD2143E:219a-20: bdag dang rigs drug sems can rnams //
T02TD2143E:219a-21: 'chi med dngos grub thob gyur nas //
T02TD2143E:219a-22: tshe dpag med pa thob par shog //
T02TD2143E:219a-23: / rgya gar gyi pandi ta zla ba bzang po dang /
T02TD2143E:219a-24: bod kyi lo ts'a ba glan dang ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o /
